content:
Daivatthin maathaavaayoll
Paavanakanyakamariyaammi-
/tnnundaakatte lokatthil
/tdishakallilengum nallormma
Daivam thalsmrthi valuthaakki
Thal praarththhana nyangallkkabhayam.

Darshakanivaham shleehaganam
Nin sharane mrthiyettoraam
/tsahadenmaar parishuddhanmaar
/tvishvaasikallaam malppaanmaar
Ennivar thal praarththhanayaale
Paaril shaanti pulartthaname.

Kartthaave! Nin jeevaravam
Mannaayttheernna mrthanmaare
/tkabareennum parudeesayile-
/tykkaahvaanam cheythettaname.
Sajana sahitham nedaname
Shaashvathajeevan mrthalokam.
